name: Hacker's Climb
description:
You are tasked with climbing the tower and bypass security and deliver the package. To complete this task, you've been given the ability to hack. No, you won't hack the system. You're hacking the game itself.

This game was created for the WeeklyGameJam week 138: Hack

This game was made in a week, so it may have some  bugs/issues. Feel free to tell me about them in the comments.

(I am aware the main menu is a bit tricky, I apologize. You just have to click the button several times for it actually work)

(I also apologize that there is no sound in this game)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • A and D to move. W to jump.
  • Click the Hack button to enter Hack Mode.
  • In Hack Mode, you can:
    • Move enemies
    • Turn enemies
    • Blind enemies
